experience.title: Backend Developer
experience.description: Developing robust APIs and backend logic to support digital products for a fast-growing consumer electronics startup. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable and maintainable solutions.

experience.title: Freelance Web Developer
experience.description: Designing and managing websites for local clients, with a focus on modern technologies such as React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. Delivering user-friendly and responsive web solutions tailored to client needs.
